description: Retrieval parameters and policies for different query types

retrieval.rationale: Summaries need comprehensive coverage, so we retrieve more chunks and boost diversity to capture all main points

chunking.rationale: Full sections help maintain context and coherence in summaries

filtering.rationale: Document and folder filters matter, but date ranges are less relevant for summaries

retrieval.rationale: Extractions need high precision, so we use stricter scoring and less diversity

chunking.rationale: Specific extractions don't need full sections, just relevant chunks

filtering.rationale: All filters matter for precise extractions

retrieval.rationale: Numeric queries benefit from keyword matching (BM25) for finding specific values

chunking.rationale: Numeric data is often in tables or specific sections

filtering.rationale: Date ranges are important for time-series numeric data

retrieval.rationale: Search queries need broad coverage with equal weighting of semantic and keyword matching

chunking.rationale: Search benefits from context around matches

filtering.rationale: Document filters matter for scoped searches
